label: „ÄêDEBUT STREAM„ÄëHi!üêô #hololiveEnglish #holoMyth
longText: Where everything began. Looking back at what you wanted to achieve, you've definitely made a lot of progress, and made good on a lot of your goals! Let's accomplish a lot this year as well!

label: „ÄêCOLLAB„ÄëThe Interrogation Begins.... #hololiveEnglish #holoMyth
longText: The first full HoloMyth collab, right on the day of debut! The tiny doodles on your board will never not be adorable. And you won your very first golden YAGOO! What even happened with the points...?

label: „ÄêCHAT+DOODLE„ÄëLet's Draw HoloEN!!
longText: Your very first drawing stream, and the first stream on your channel after debut! We still marvel at how you draw and chat with us at the same time.

label: „ÄêCALL OF CTHULU„Äë New Phone Who Dis #TAKOTIME #hololiveEnglish #holoMyth
longText: The first game stream on your channel! A truly unforgettable experience, but somehow we don't remember the Arkham Editions...

label: „ÄêCHAT„ÄëThank you!!!
longText: Barely a week in and your channel received monetization! Lots of superchats and 10Qs all around, and you sung us your favorite Aimer song! Also delicious fire noodles...

label: „ÄêCOLLAB„ÄëArknights waifu ranking with Ninomae Ina‚Äônis #takotime #kfp #„Ç≠„Ç¢„É©„Ç§„Éñ
longText: Your first one-on-one collab, in which you rank your favorite waifus of Arknights with Kiara! APPLE PIE.

label: „ÄêLET'S WATCH„ÄëColor Out of Space Watchalong!
longText: Your very first watchalong! We definitely had our sanity tested this stream, but this is a movie that has stood the test of time--we still reference it to this day!

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë!!!!!
longText: Although the memberships were delayed, we still had a great time during your first ever emote-drawing stream! Takos couldn't wait to use these emotes in YouTube Chat!

label: „ÄêCall of Cthulhu„ÄëCreative Title #325
longText: The day your memberships opened--finally we understood how we would evolve from our void forms! Still didn't expect to find the key to the boiler room here...

label: „ÄêDRAWING„ÄëTime ART-tack!!!!?!
longText: An absolutely adorable illustration of Fubuki, drawn for her birthday! You're one step closer to drawing everybody in Hololive! As always, thank you for all the wonderful art tips!

label: „ÄêDRAWING„ÄëGesture Drawing + Doodle #1
longText: Today marks the founding of Inacademy! Perhaps if we continue to study with you, we can graduate with our drawing degrees someday... (we also got the first stream that started without a loading screen)

label: [MINECRAFT] HOLO EN SERVER #HololiveEnglish
longText: The first collab stream on the HoloEN minecraft server! You all spent quite a bit of time in that tunnel... It turned out great in the end, though!

label: „ÄêCOLLAB„ÄëThere is Pasta Among Us
longText: The first collab with NePoLaBo and HoloMyth playing Among Us--this is the very first time we learnt that Ina is actually a yandere (somewhat)! Also the beginning of a love story between a seal and tako...

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Gesture Drawing + Doodle #4
longText: After Inacademy class ended, we got to brainstorm even more adorable and iconic membership emotes!

label: „ÄêHOLOEN COLLAB„Äë KNOCK KNOCK!!
longText: Happy Holo-ween! A full HoloMyth collab playing Secret Neighbor, in which you showcase your incredible deception skills (and terrifying in-game microphone)!

label: „ÄêCOLLAB„Äë Drawing with Iofi-senpai!
longText: The first collab with HoloID 1st gen: two perfectly normal humans drawing one another! We could tell you two hit it off right away.

label: „ÄêDRAWING„ÄëENMA Design + Random Drawing Stream
longText: The legendary Enma, given form...

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Gesture Drawing + Doodle #6
longText: Congratulations on 500k subscribers, Ina! The usual gesture drawing is always helpful to see, and the doodle with you wearing glasses is super cute. Glasses are really versatile-

label: „ÄêHOLOEN COLLAB„Äë Don't Starve Together!!
longText: First time playing Don't Starve Together! Ame tried her best to keep everyone organized, and somehow you guys managed to get together at the end without too many fatalities...

label: „ÄêCHAT„Äë We Need to Tako
longText: One of the scariest titles ever created... but you reveal that you're now a senpai! Also, the first stream to include the Christmas Tako loading screen!

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Let's Learn Krita Together!!
longText: Learning new programs is always fun! We got the chance to join you as you tried out Krita. Getting some tips along the way, learning a lot about how brushes work, the importance of flipping your canvas, and much more!

label: „ÄêPuyo Puyo Tetris 2„Äë BOIN BOIN
longText: Your very first sponsored stream! Your gaming prowess was shown to everyone this stream; you calmly destroyed your genmates! Maybe the Tetris player isn't at a slight disadvantage...

label: „ÄêCOLLAB„Äë HAPPY HOLIDAYS!!!
longText: A full HoloMyth collab to decorate a Christmas tree on the HoloEN Minecraft server! It was wonderful seeing everybody get together and have fun for the Holidays.

label: „ÄêTITANFALL 2„Äë Phone Home? Home Phone?
longText: Your first (and last) stream of Titanfall 2! You seemed to grasp the mechanics of the game right away, because it took you just over five hours to complete!

label: „ÄêMinecraft„Äë Hololive JP Server Tour with Nene and Polka!! ‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•
longText: Your first adventure in the wild JP Minecraft server. Nene and Polka do a great job showing you around--but somehow they're fighting over you? Is this another senpai to add to the harem?

label: Let's Make Macaron!! Takoholidays Cookie Showcase!!!
longText: We were blessed with Takorons. Spending Christmas Eve with you was a blast, and Takos even show off their own creations! You even took your time to go through every submission... so sweet!

label: „ÄêMinecraft„Äë HO HO HO
longText: MERRY CHRISTMAS! Spending time with the Tentacult on this wonderful day is truly heartwarming, and you build the iconic Torii gate that stands strong to this day!

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Goodbye 2020! Last Doodle Stream of the Year!
longText: KIMONO INA!!! We went for a little trip down memory lane for the final doodle stream of the year. You wished for a year full of fun things, and we hope that you got what you wished for!

label: „ÄêMinecraft„Äë HNY!!!
longText: A nice and relaxing New Year's Eve in Minecraft watching fireworks together and being raided by pillagers. Thank you for everything this year, and let's do our best in 2021 as well!

label: „ÄêCHAT„Äë Resolutions & Goals for the New Year!!
longText: HAPPY NEW YEAR! You go through your goals and resolutions for the new year, and even get to roll your first gacha of the year. Wait--you have to move your giant what...?

label: „ÄêCHAT„Äë TAKOYAKI PARTY!!!!
longText: It's a party and we're invited!  ...to be the main dish?? But later you revealed the terrible truth... it wasn't takoyaki--it was ikayaki! Hope the mess wasn't too bad after the stream~

label: „ÄêTIME-LAPSE„Äë New Year's Greetings
longText: Your very first time-lapse video! Seeing the process from start to finish with your own tips is truly amazing. Thank you so much for sharing your knowledge with us! The completed illustration is beautiful.

label: „ÄêRing Fit Adventure„Äë PAIN
longText: Your very first RFA stream! The pain and suffering is worth it if you want to increase your stamina so that you can draw even more!

label: „ÄêShadowverse„Äë Let's Draw Shadowverse!!!! (Sponsored)
longText: Another sponsored stream! Your Luna illustration was super adorable.

label: „ÄêCOLLAB„Äë 51 Haachamas Around The World!!!
longText: A very fun collab featuring HoloEN's Haachama! Wait, is that a chess match? Oh no...

label: MOLLY.ONLINE x Hololive JP 5th Generation
longText: The MOLLY.ONLINE merchandise for Hololive 5th generation that you illustrated for was released, and the cross-generational bonds increased even more!

label: „ÄêPrincess Connect: Re Dive„Äë YABAI DESU NE!! Let's Draw Priconne!!!
longText: Another sponsored stream, featuring Princess Connect: Re Dive this time! You showed us your unlocked potential as you gacha and color at the same time... Your Kokkoro illustration is super cute! Thank you for all the advice!

label: „Äê„ÅäÁµµÊèè„Åç„Ç≥„É©„Éú/Drawing collab„Äë„Ç§„Éä„Å°„ÇÉ„Çì„Ç§„Ç™„Éï„Ç£„Å°„ÇÉ„Çì„Å®„ÅäÁµµÊèè„ÅçÔºÅ„ÉªDrawing with Ina'nis chan&Iofi chan!„Äê„Éó„É≠Êº´ÁîªÂÆ∂Vtuber„Äë
longText: A collab on Pochi's channel with Iofi!

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë NEW SUPER NENECHI
longText: An illustration stream featuring your super cute wife! It's always impressive to see you draw, no matter how many times we see it.

label: „ÄêPhasmophobia„Äë Ghost-chan Handshake Event?
longText: An incredibly fun and chaotic collab with Reine, Iofi, and Pochi! All this laughter is contagious--wait, this is a horror game?

label: „ÄêHollow Knight„Äë Swoosh Swoosh „Äê#1„Äë
longText: The start to your playthrough of an amazing game. Seeing you adapt and learn so quickly is a sight to behold.

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Valentine?!
longText: Congratulations on 800k subscribers! Just a bit more to that 1 million mark... Your design sense is shown once again as you make yourself a beautiful outfit to wear in this lovely illustration!

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Gesture Drawing + New Emotes #17
longText: Gesture drawing and more amazing emotes! Thank you for the W A H.

label: „ÄêREADALONG„Äë Spice & Wolf Readalong!
longText: A cozy readalong stream of a series loved by many, Spice and Wolf! It was a very nice and relaxing experience listening to you read.

label: „ÄêKARAOKE„Äë Tako Sings
longText: Very blessed archived unarchived karaoke. This set list was fantastic!

label: „ÄêHollow Knight„Äë LAMP „Äê#8.55„Äë
longText: And so concludes a great journey that spans an entire month and more. Good work! Watching you play through all of Hollow Knight was a wonderful ride.

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Miku~ Miku~
longText: Drawing everybody's favorite Hatsune Miku on Mi-ku day (3/9). It was a super cute illustration! It makes a Tako wonder though, will this stream lead into something bigger...?

label: „Äê6 MONTH ANNIVERSARY„Äë Half a Year of HoloEN!!!....and ANNOUNCEMENTS?!
longText: 6 months already?! It felt like barely any time passed since your debut with the rest of Hololive Myth. Naturally, the best way to celebrate this milestone is to... stave off impending doom with your friends?

label: „ÄêRing Fit Adventure„Äë No Cost Too Great
longText: Your second RFA stream! Please keep up the good work!

label: „ÄêTouhou Spell Bubble„Äë ‚ë®
longText: A sponsored stream of Touhou Spell Bubble! Listening to you jam out to Bad Apple was very satisfying, but probably also gave a few Takos whiplash from the fact it's more than a decade old now.

label: „ÄêMONSTER HUNTER RISE„Äë Rise to the Occasion!!!
longText: The beginnings of Ina Ross! Also, the thumbnail is a masterpiece.

label: „ÄêHOLOEN COLLAB„ÄëNot a Joke! Serious Outfit Reveal on April the 1st #yurumyth #hololiveEnglish
longText: Finally, your very first outfit reveal! This is totally legit, right? Nothing suspicious here, just HoloEN having a good time while they play Jackbox Games.

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Wah
longText: Blessed OkaKoro art! The surprise Korone visit was incredibly adorable.

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Nier....Far...Wherever You Are...
longText: You got the amazing opportunity of drawing some fanart for one of your favorite series! We got to see your art process as you experimented with different techniques, giving shape to the amazing final product!

label: „ÄêPaper Mario: The Origami King„Äë It'sa ME! „Äê#1„Äë
longText: The start of a paper journey! The dialogue in this game is a ton of fun, and the stream was really entertaining to watch!

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë Nier-ly Time!!
longText: Ending W: [W]ahnderful art

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë INAFF
longText: The Ame illustration from back in September of last year! The atmosphere and lighting in this piece are incredible.

label: „ÄêNieR:Automata„Äë THIS CAN (NOT) CONTINUE „Äê#1„Äë
longText: A playthrough of an incredibly beloved game! Being able to experience it together with you makes it even better.

label: „ÄêNieR:Automata„Äë BECOME AS TAKO „Äê#3„Äë
longText: It was an amazing experience, seeing this to the end with you. Thank you.

label: „ÄêNEW OUTFIT REVEAL„Äë The Joy of Tako #fashionINAsta
longText: Finally, your very first outfit reveal! We Takodachi have been excited for so long, and Kuroboshi-papa's wonderful designs always impress--you look absolutely amazing in painter's attire!

label: „ÄêCOLLAB„Äë Battle of Doot ft. Calli
longText: An absolutely legendary battle between two masters of the recorder... Who won? Everybody!

label: Take Me Home, Country Roads - hololive English -Myth- Cover
longText: A full -Myth- collab cover! What a wonderful cover it is, too! Country roads, take me home~~

label: „ÄêMinecraft„Äë Alexa Play Ungravel
longText: "You missed a call from Takanashi Kiara..."

label: „ÄêBAYONETTA„Äë Flyyy Awayyyy Nowwww „Äê#1„Äë
longText: The beginning of a very stylish journey, filled with countless WATOTO.

label: Birthday YAY!!!! #BirthdayINA2021
longText: Happy Birthday Ina! You're finally [REDACTED] years old! Seeing everyone call in was so wholesome, and we finally have our own takodachis to sit on! And what's this... a new original song??

label: „ÄêCHAT„Äë #WAHnMILLION YAKISOBAAAaaaa
longText: 1 million Takodachi! This is truly something to behold. It will only go up from here, so let's keep moving forward!

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë The Name is Yuul B. Alwright
longText: Another character design stream, but this time you drew your very own character for the TTRPG!

label: „ÄêTTRPG„Äë Meet Yuul B. Alwright TUTORIAL EDITION
longText: Your very first TTRPG stream, with Calli teaching you the basics of the game! The ending was abrupt... at least you had pizza?

label: „ÄåDAL ITEMS Vol.1„ÄçDRAW A LOT√óÂàùÈü≥„Éü„ÇØ Art by Ninomae Ina‚Äônis(hololive EN) Supported by Wacom/CLIP STUDIO
longText: DRAW A LOT and an official sponsorship from Wacom and CLIP STUDIO!! It's absolutely amazing that you were able to do something like this--we hope that there may be many more opportunities like this in the future! To think that this came to be from your Miku day illustration stream... May this stream inspire many aspiring artists to continue working hard.

label: „ÄêTHE WONDERFUL 101„Äë TAKODACHIS.....Assemble? „Äê#1„Äë
longText: The start of your tako unification series!

label: „ÄêMinecraft„Äë Usaken Summer Festival with Lamy chan~!!
longText: Your first one-on-one collab with Lamy--and it's a date! This summer festival will be one to remember.

label: Anime Expo Lite 2021
longText: Your first ever convention! The Myth crew joins together for two panels, lots of laughs, some Q&A, and even more exclusive merch!

label: Drawfest - Ninomae Ina'nis - Let's draw Ninomae Ina'nis ! „Åø„Çì„Å™„Åß Ninomae Ina'nis „ÇíÊèè„Åì„ÅÜÔºÅ
longText: Another huge event for you; this time Pixiv invited you to participate in Drawfest, an online, interactive drawing festival for the global art community!

label: „ÄêMinecraft„Äë UPRP UPRP
longText: A stream full of accomplishments and philosophical discussion. Uparupa sure is fun to say! Wait, where are the uparupas...?

label: MOLLY.ONLINE x Shirogane Noel/Shiranui Flare
longText: The MOLLY.ONLINE merchandise for Hololive's own NoeFlare that you made illustrations for was released--they must have really liked your first fanart of them together!

label: „ÄêMinecraft„Äë Ender Dragon Hunt with HoloEN!!!
longText: The girls of Hololive Myth embark on epic journey! How many bodies must be thrown at the Ender Dragon before Myth triumphs?!

label: „ÄêMinecraft„Äë END EXPLORATION
longText: The hunt for ender cities begin! Will you find an end ship and acquire an elytra for yourself? Spoiler: There was an end ship, alright. Not too sure about the elytra.

label: „ÄêResident Evil 7: Biohazard„Äë W-W-WAH „Äê#1„Äë
longText: The start of horror game week, featuring the much beloved Resident Evil 7: Biohazard! There's nothing quite like shooting at people while wildly exclaiming "Let's talk!" is there?

label: „ÄêCHAT„Äë Summer Time! Tako Time!...and?
longText: The last stream before your summer "break!" But you have something special in store for us...

label: „ÄéVIOLET„Äè - Ninomae Ina'nis
longText: It was teased for a few months, but the day finally came. The wait was absolutely worth it! Your very first original song! And you sound amazing! And the background track is amazing! And the art is amazing, and so is the MV! And-

label: „ÄêCHAT„Äë I'M BACK!!!!
longText: We welcome you back from your week break! Although break is probably too generous of a word... You reveal to us some more lore, and a sneak peak of ACOUSTIC VIOLET!

label: „ÄêMinecraft„Äë END EXPLORATION Pt.2
longText: ...Glad the end ship wasn't cut in half this time. You now have your very own elytra! Isn't it amazing just how high and fast you can soar with it?

label: „ÄêEnder Lilies„Äë Begin! „Äê#1„Äë
longText: Your very first Ender Lilies stream! You seem to really enjoy these types of games now!

label: „ÄêTHE WONDERFUL 101„Äë TAKODACHIS UNITE...UNLIMITED...FORM? „Äê#6„Äë
longText: The final Wonderful 101 stream... UNITE TAKO!

label: „ÄêTTRPG & Gartic Phone„Äë HUNTERS PARTY HARD with GARTIC PHONE
longText: The first full "TTRPG" stream on your channel--but it turned into a fun chatting and Gartic Phone stream!

label: „ÄêIt Takes Two„Äë Hope for Teamwork!! „Äê#1„Äë
longText: The beginning of something special... hopefully you won't get divorced!

label: „ÄêMario Kart 8DX Tournament„Äë LET'S GET DOWN TO BUSINESS EN x ID Tournament!!
longText: Your training arc paid off--you show your incredible tako drifting and win the first full EN x ID tournament collab! Just how powerful can one priestess be?!

label: Fan Expo Boston 2021
longText: Your latest convention appearance at Boston--this time with Ame and Kiara to enjoy your company as you have another Q&A session, and some more convention merch!

label: „ÄêEnder Lilies„Äë Tiro Finale! „Äê#5„Äë
longText: TIRO FINALE! You completed Ender Lilies with flying colors!

label: „ÄêDRAWING„Äë TakoEats Beauty Division
longText: A fun drawing stream in which you design new hairstyles for all of HoloMyth!

label: „ÄêIt Takes Two„Äë Hope 3.33 „Äê#3„Äë
longText: Your teamwork pays off in this final stream, and you show your full potential together!

label: It's been a WAHnderful Year!!!! #WAHnniversary
longText: It really has been a WAHnderful year! (Though, the mental damage you suffered from watching your debut stream probably wasn't all that wahnderful...) Congratulations on your 1st debut anniversary! May you achieve much this year as well, we'll be here to support you every step of the way!

label: „Äê1 YEAR ANNIVERSARY„ÄëA Whole Year of...!?!? #Mythiversary
longText: Hey, that's today! ... Probably. Maybe. Or was it yesterday? Or a few days ago?... Anyway, congratulations to you and Myth on your first debut anniversary! Thank you for all your hard work, and we'll be sure to support all of you from now on too!
